text: Ensure that all required fields for your project, such as color options, font size, font family, and others, are defined in a JSON file.

Hey <@U085D0768BT>, could you please clarify where exactly I need to call the JSON file? I believe I’m getting the fields (like text, image, etc.) that I’ve created in the modules, and I need to reference them in the JSON file. However, I’m wondering if there’s any additional setup required for working with JSON—like specifying a path in the CSS main file or something like that?
I know these might sound like simple or silly questions, but I’d really appreciate any guidance you can provide from the start.
I hope my queries make sense!
Oh, thank you, buddy. I really appreciate that.
Also, how can I make the URL look clean and perfect?
Keep your URL short & descriptive also avoid special characters, use hayphens to separate the words.
Well, I mean to say, where can I set or edit the URL? Thanks :)
Simply create pages and set URL from the setting tab of the page.
